name: FTL Starships - Space Combat
description:
** Racing your starship and beat your opponents **
*** Collect items to power ups ***

Have Fun in Space Racing with Faster-Than-Light Starship. A simple racing game with stunning graphics.

Are you ready to go?

And while this is a single player game, you don't have to play single. Action games are more fun with friends, and you can try to beat your friends and strangers on the shared leaderboard (Game Services or Game center depending on platform).

How to Play:
- Touch to steer your starship
- Avoid other starships
- Collect items to power-up
- Collect items to destroy other ships
- Go as far as you can to be in top of leaderboard

Note:
- Ships may start slow and move faster as time pass.
